fr.istic.aoc.metronome

Interface ME

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Subject
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    MEImpl

    public interface ME
extends Subject
    Metronome Engine's Interface. This class is a Subject also.
    Author:
    Jiyoung Park

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getBar() 
      int getBeats() 
      boolean isRunning() 
      void setBar(int bar)
      Sets the Bar value and executes BarChangedCmd command to update related JavaFX's Text component
      void setBeats(int bpm)
      Sets the BPM value and executes BeatsChangedCmd command to update related JavaFX's Text component If the isRunning flag is true then the tick method will be executed periodically with new bpm
      void setRunning(boolean running)
      Sets the isRunning flag.
      void speedDown()
      Decrease the BPM value by 5.
      void speedUp()
      Increase the BPM value by 5.
      void tick()
      If the isRunning is true then executes BeatEventCmd and barEventCmd

      • Methods inherited from interface fr.istic.aoc.metronome.observer.Subject

        registerObserver, unregisterObserver

    • Method Detail

      • setRunning

        void setRunning(boolean running)
        Sets the isRunning flag. IF isRunning field of the MEImpl class is true then executes tick method periodically.
        Precondition:
        MEImpl's beats value must be grater than 0.
        Parameters:
        running - The boolean that signifies the Metronome is running or not.

      • speedUp

        void speedUp()
        Increase the BPM value by 5.

      • speedDown

        void speedDown()
        Decrease the BPM value by 5.

      • setBeats

        void setBeats(int bpm)
        Sets the BPM value and executes BeatsChangedCmd command to update related JavaFX's Text component If the isRunning flag is true then the tick method will be executed periodically with new bpm
        Parameters:
        bpm -

      • setBar

        void setBar(int bar)
        Sets the Bar value and executes BarChangedCmd command to update related JavaFX's Text component
        Parameters:
        bar -

        int getBeats()

        int getBar()

        void tick()
